Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HCV envelope protein)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20156485]hepatitis C virus(HCVpp):inhibition of virus infection in Huh-7 human hepatoma cells(88% inhibition at 50 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits a post-binding step in HCV entry.

Literature.Title: A peptide derived from hepatitis C virus E2 envelope protein inhibits a post-binding step in HCV entry.
Literature.Author: Liu R, Tewari M, Kong R, Zhang R, Ingravallo P, Ralston R.
